title: Writing Support Circle Workshop for Strengthening Academic Writing Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of the basic structure of academic writing and experience in writing research papers
context.additional_context: Customized learning design considering the applicability of current practitioners' tasks

learning_goals: Participants can write a 1,500-character research abstract by applying the logical structure of academic writing (introduction-methods-results-discussion).
Through feedback circle activities, learners can conduct peer evaluations and suggest at least three specific improvements.
Learners can utilize academic tone and citation methods with 90% accuracy by applying academic expression conventions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
